body: Redemption Level: 0. Reading this series has art that reminds me of a classic series by this author: Entanglement (Karami Zakari) (I highly recommend it if you never read it before; but, ONLY if you can handle NTR, not suitable for soft-hearted fellas). Just click the tag of author's name above and you'll find the series.
